comment.body:
Wendy Hanamura is such a lovely lady. You can see how excited she is about Tamas' (or is it nofish?) ZeroNet. It is a great thing to see.

I know that the cool parts of ZeroNet is in how it works but **I know** that everyone would flip the fuck out if they saw a [peer-to-peer email site](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MaiL5gfBM1cyb4a8e3iiL8L5gXmoAJu27), saw that sites like [GIF Time](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Gif7PqWTzVWDQ42Mo7np3zXmGAo3DXc7h) can exist or got a better idea about the *community* around here. Hopefully people will try it for themselves.

> [p2p](#comment_51_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): 

Tamas' interview starts [here](https://archive.org/details/DecentralizedWeb20160607pt3?start=3015). 
Someone should comment on archive.org to tell them that the segment links are all missing a */*.
